price: 14. „Ir jie turi kaltinimą man nusikaltimu, ir aš bijau, kad jie nužudys mane.“
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
